ValidationRule.description: Only Admins and CusOps users are allowed to use another Status than New. RO-1827
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Customer Operations Manager", $Profile.Name <> "Marketing Operations", $Profile.Name <> "Head of Customer Operations", NOT( ISPICKVAL( Status , "New") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please create new cases with the Status "New". Updates of the Case Status will be done by CusOps or IntOps.
